title: Stuck in a rut? How to appreciate your life again, according to science
excerpt: After a while, even the most exciting relationships, jobs and environments lose their spark. But cognitive neuroscientist Tali Sharot says it's possible to fall back in love with life's small joys.

title: This former Google X exec reverse engineered happiness — here's what he found
excerpt: Mo Gawdat says it took him much longer to find happiness than it did for him to find success, so he hacked it for everyone else.

title: 7 Things A Happiness Scientist Taught Me About Finding More Joy
excerpt: “Without unhappiness, you wouldn’t survive, learn, or come up with a good idea,” points out Harvard professor Arthur C Brooks.

title: 100,000 happy moments
excerpt: What makes people happy? A huge database is making it possible to discern the answer at last.
